bug.short_desc: Selection in the new Treevirtual Widget

long_desc.thetext:
The new Tree Virtual widget does a great job of letting you navigate the tree without changing the selected element.
The problem although is that while the element is actually slected as soon as you open/close another element, the selected one is not highlighted anymore. This means that "visually" it seem not to be selected anymore and can lead to confusion in the user.
Solution: keep the selected element highlighted even if other elements are opened/closed in the meantime.

With the addition, a while back, of retaining selected nodes in the data model, there is no longer a need to clear selections upon open/close of the tree. That (mis)feature has now been removed.
Thanks.
